content.pl: Kupi≈Çam w kauflandzie cena 99 z≈Ç pomy≈õla≈Çam ≈ºe za takƒÖ cenƒô do moich potrzeb bedzie ok . Przepu≈õci≈Çam ziemniaki i ca≈Çy zmielony farsz musialam wyrzuciƒá, gdy≈º nagle zaczƒÖ≈Ç leciec smar. Rozkrƒôci≈Çam wszystkie czƒô≈õci  wymy≈Çam ale w ≈õrodku nie by≈Ço ≈õladu po smarze. Za kilka dni ponownie spr√≥bowa≈Çam i niestety po raz kolejny wszystko w koszu wyladowa≈Ço . Wkurzy≈Çam siƒô zapakowa≈Çam maszynkƒô do pude≈Çka wziƒô≈Çam paragon i pojecha≈Çam oddaƒá zwr√≥cili mi pieniƒÖdze bez problemu do≈Ço≈ºy≈Çam trochƒô i kupi≈Çam w innym sklepie maszynkƒô do miƒôsa razem szatkownicƒÖ. Teraz jestem zadowolona z zakupu a tej maszynki esperanza nie polecam
content.en: I bought it in a Kaufland store for PLN 99, I thought that for this price it would be ok for my needs. I skipped the potatoes and had to throw away all the ground stuffing because suddenly the grease started leaking out. I disassembled all the parts and washed them, but there was no trace of grease inside. In a few days I tried again and unfortunately everything ended up in the trash again. I got angry, packed the mincer in a box, took the receipt and went to return it, they refunded my money without any problems, I added some money and bought a meat grinder and a shredder in another store. Now I am satisfied with the purchase and I do not recommend this Esperanza razor

content.en: The so-called product economy class. It does what it's supposed to do, but without the bells and whistles. The finish of the plastics is quite crude, it rather resembles a Chinese toy.

content.pl: Maszynka z gatunku jednoraz√≥wek. Nietypowe sitka nietypowy n√≥≈º tnƒÖcy ≈ölimak wykonany z aluminium. Efekt to po zmieleniu 15 kilogram√≥w miƒôsa przez okres 6 miesiƒôcy  nastƒÖpi≈Ço  wyrobienie czƒô≈õci trzymajƒÖcej n√≥≈º. Czyli z mielenia nici. Dodatkowo w Polsce nie ma czƒô≈õci zamiennych do maszynki. Wpisanie w wyszukiwarkƒô generuje mylne rekordy nie zwiƒÖzane w og√≥le z potrzebami. Jedyna zaleta gdy kupujesz w Kuflandzie to jest bezproblemowy zwrot kasy. Tak wiƒôc raczej kupienie tego produktu to du≈ºe ryzyko.
content.en: A disposable machine. Unusual strainers, unusual cutting knife. A screw made of aluminum. The result is that after grinding 15 kilograms of meat for a period of 6 months, the part that holds the knife was formed. That is, from grinding threads. Additionally, there are no spare parts for the machine in Poland. Typing it into a search engine generates misleading records that are not related to your needs at all. The only advantage when you buy at Kufland is a hassle-free refund. So, buying this product is a big risk.

content.en: Already during the first use, the all-aluminum screw began to wear out while working in the strainer, generating a dark gray slime that got into the meat. All contaminated meat was suitable only for garbage. The manufacturer should withdraw such a product from the market. I do not recommend it, it is better to spend more and buy a decent product.
